word: G2106 - εὐδοκέω - eudokéō - yoo-dok-eh'-o - Think good

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - பிரியமாயிரு, விருப்பங் கொண்டிரு, நல்லதென்று எண்ணு, வாஞ்சையாயிரு
it seems good to one, is one's good pleasure; to think it good, choose, determine, decide

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G2095 and G1380; to think well of, that is, approve (an act); specifically to approbate (a person or thing): - think good, (be well) please (-d), be the good (have, take) pleasure, be willing.
Cognate: G2106, G2107
